{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Netgear |model=Orbi Router |revision=(RBR50) |asin=B01LXTL37N |newegg=N82E16833122918 |price=250 |series=AC3000 |est_release_date=11/01/2016 |fcc_date=08/23/2016 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf= |availability=now |type=wireless router, wireless system |fcc_id=PY316200341 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=3.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Qualcomm |cpu1_model=IPQ4019 |cpu1_cspeed=716 MHz |cpu1_cores=4 |fla1=32 |fla1_brand=Winbond |fla1_model=W25Q256FVFG |ram1=512 |ram1_brand=Nanya |ram1_model= |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=1 |wi1_chip1_brand=Qualcomm |wi1_chip1_model=IPQ4019 |wi1_chip2_brand=Qualcomm |wi1_chip2_model=IPQ4019 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_chip1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |wi2_chip1_model=QCA9984 |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi2_txchains=4 |wi2_rxchains=4 |wi2_sstreams=4 |eth_cpu=true |sw_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |sw_model=QCA8075 |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=3 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=2.4GHz WLAN Power Amplifier Module;Skyworks;SKY2623L;;2; ,,, 5GHz WLAN Power Amplifier Module;RFMD;RFPA5542;;2; ,,, 5GHz Backhaul Power Amplifier Module;RFMD;RFPA5542;;4; ,,, Bluetooth 4.1 SoC;Cambridge Silicon Radio (CSR);CSR8811;;1; |flags=Wave2, MU-MIMO, Bluetooth LE, |stock_boot=CFE |stock_os=Linux |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ssid=ORBI50 |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=password }}
:• '''1733''' Mbps - 4-stream 802.11ac backhaul (433Mbps per stream), :• '''866''' Mbps - 2-stream 802.11ac device (433Mbps per stream), :• '''400''' Mbps - 2-stream 802.11n device (2.4GHz QAM-256) channel = '''''AC3000'' class'''
{{TagLine|Orbi High-Performance AC3000 Tri-Band WiFi Router}} ''802.11ac Two-Stream Wave2 WiFi plus Dedicated Quad-Stream Wireless Backhaul'' :{{ProductPage|https://www.netgear.com/orbi/rbk50.aspx}} {{SupportPage|vendor=Netgear|model=rbr50}} Setup GUI available at http://orbilogin.com when connected via Wi-Fi. *Netgear Orbi Kit (RBK50): Orbi Router (RBR50) + Orbi Satellite (RBS50) *Netgear Orbi Kit (RBK53): Orbi Router (RBR50) + 2x Orbi Satellite (RBS50) ===Product features=== *Dedicated four stream 802.11ac wireless backhaul *4GB of flash is claimed by Netgear ===Reviews=== *[https://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-reviews/33028-netgear-orbi-reviewed ''NETGEAR Orbi'' on '''SmallNetBuilder'''] ===Forum threads=== *[https://community.netgear.com/t5/Orbi/Orbi-Router-Firmware-RBR50/td-p/1130054 ''Orbi Router Firmware RBR50'' on '''NETGEAR Community'''] :Mentions that the stock firmware is a variant of OpenWrt *[https://openitforum.pl/gallery/album/275-netgear-orbi-wifi-system-rbk30/ ''NETGEAR Orbi WiFi System (RBK30)'' gallery on '''OpenITforum'''] ===See also=== :[[List of Wireless Systems]] *[[Netgear Orbi Router (RBR50)]] - [[Netgear]] ''Orbi Router'' • [http://www.netgear.com/home/products/networking/orbi/ PPage] :[[Qualcomm]] IPQ4019 (Dakota) 2x 2T2R, QCA9984 (Cascade) 4T4R AC *[[Netgear Orbi Satellite (RBS50)]] - [[Netgear]] ''Orbi Satellite'' • ''Orbi Kit (RBK50)'' :[[Qualcomm]] IPQ4019 (Dakota) 2x 2T2R, QCA9984 (Cascade) 4T4R AC *[[Netgear Orbi Outdoor Satellite (RBS50Y)]] - [[Netgear]] ''Orbi Satellite'' *[[Netgear Orbi Router (RBR40)]] - [[Netgear]] ''Orbi Router'' • [http://www.netgear.com/home/products/networking/orbi/ PPage] *[[Netgear Orbi Satellite (RBS40)]] - [[Netgear]] ''Orbi Satellite'' • [http://www.netgear.com/home/products/networking/orbi/ PPage] *[[Netgear Orbi Wall Plug Satellite (RBW30)]] - [[Netgear]] ''Orbi Satellite'' *Netgear Orbi WiFi System ([https://www.netgear.com/orbi/rbk50.aspx RBK50]) - AC3000 (RBR50 + RBS50) *Netgear Orbi WiFi System ([https://www.netgear.com/orbi/rbk40.aspx RBK40]) - AC2200 (RBR40 + RBS40) *Netgear Orbi WiFi System ([https://www.netgear.com/orbi/rbk30.aspx RBK30]) - AC2200 (RBR40 + RBW30) __NOTOC__
